system.description: At 2nd level, you learn some basic protective magic. You learn the protection from evil and good spell and can cast it without a spell slot once per long rest. At level 5, you learn the force of will spell and can cast it without a spell slot once per long rest. At level 9, you learn the magic circle spell and can cast it without a spell slot once per long rest. And at level 13, you learn the banishment spell and can cast it without a spell slot once per long rest.
